title: Xbox Series S is discounted for the first time ever today only
content:
The Xbox Series S is Microsoft’s current entry-level console, giving you access to all Xbox One and Xbox Series games (plus many Xbox 360 tiles with backwards compatibility) at a lower price than the 4K-capable Xbox Series X. It was difficult to purchase the Series S for a while, but not only is it available

The post Xbox Series S is discounted for the first time ever today only appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Xbox Series S is now on sale for $249.99 at Amazon-owned Woot, a discount of $50 from the usual price.
